title: 395: Where We’re at with Christianity + Growing Up on a Hare Krishna Commune
itunes:title: 395: Where We’re at with Christianity + Growing Up on a Hare Krishna Commune
description:
Oh, #broadsquad, it’s been a minute since The Broads had a full blown #biblebroads episode! Today Bekah and Jess chat about where they are currently at with their feelings and participation with the religion they grew up with, christianity. Then they are joined by comedian Abby Roberge to hear about his experience growing up Hare Krishna, when he left that faith, and how he has returned. They all share what they currently believe, current faith practices, and much more!

 

ABBY ROBERGE: 

Instagram: @abbyroberge
